actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.
Subcommittee on International Trade. Hearings held.
Subcommittee on International Trade. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the United States Trade Representative as the President's Representative for Trade Negotiations, and for other purposes.
short_title: President's Representative for Trade Negotiations Act of 1983
subjects: Office of the U.S. Trade Representative

summary.text: President's Representative for Trade Negotiations Act of 1983 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to redesignate the United States Trade Representative as the President's Representative for Trade Negotiation.

titles.title: President's Representative for Trade Negotiations Act of 1983
A bill to redesignate the United States Trade Representative as the President's Representative for Trade Negotiations, and for other purposes.
